about_the_game:
Are you ready to take on an unprecedentedly thrilling challenge? In "Fast Running," you'll become a fearless parkour master, embarking on an adventure of extreme running! With just a click of the mouse, you can control your character to dodge left and right and leap high in critical moments, avoiding deadly traps and collecting tempting golden eggs.

But don't think it's just a simple run. As time passes, the game speed gradually increases, making each challenge more intense and exciting! You'll need to stay focused, react quickly, and use your skills to break through each level.

In this fast-paced game, your goal is not only to survive but also to collect as many golden eggs as possible, break your own high score record, and prove that you're the bravest and most agile parkour master!

Join "Fast Running" now, experience the endless thrill of running, and take on the ultimate test of speed and reaction. Keep challenging your own limits and become a true parkour hero!

content_descriptors.notes: Light nudity, sexy temptation, cute and playful, not suitable for children.

name: Fast Running

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window7/10/11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8250U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
